name: stjude_tsne
title: St. Jude Cloud Interactive t-SNE
summary: Produce a t-SNE plot that highlights input sample(s) against a cohort of existing samples.

inputSpec.name: reference_counts
inputSpec.label: Reference counts to compare
inputSpec.help: Provide a cohort of samples to use as reference data

inputSpec.name: input_counts
inputSpec.label: Input counts to compare
inputSpec.help: Provide sample(s) to compare. File must have the following properties: sample_name, library_type, read_length, strandedness, and pairing.

inputSpec.name: all_strandedness
inputSpec.label: Strandedness
inputSpec.help: Specify whether library was stranded. This option will apply to any input samples without a specification.

inputSpec.name: all_library_type
inputSpec.label: Library type
inputSpec.help: Specify library type. This option will apply to any input samples without a specification.

inputSpec.name: all_read_length
inputSpec.label: Read length
inputSpec.help: Specify read length. This option will apply to any input samples without a specification.

inputSpec.name: all_pairing
inputSpec.label: Read pairing
inputSpec.help: Specify read pairing. This option will apply to any input samples without a specification.

inputSpec.name: intermediate
inputSpec.label: Return intermediate file
inputSpec.help: If desired, return data from an intermediate point in the analysis. 'original_matrix' is the matrix of counts. 'variance_stabilized' is the matrix after running varianceStabilizingTransformation. 'batch_corrected' is the matrix after ComBat batch correction. 'tsne_output' is the matrix after Rtsne has been run. 'matrix' is the file input to the R script for plotting.

outputSpec.name: tsne_matrix
outputSpec.label: Matrix of values for t-SNE graph

outputSpec.name: trustworthiness_score
outputSpec.label: scikit-learn trustworthiness metric
outputSpec.help: Provides a metric of how well the low dimensional embedding reflects the high dimensionality relatedness of the data
